subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Steve Flesch was one of the few players who had no issues with the bunkers at the Memorial, and for good reason. He was not in any of them Thursday, which might explain why he was atop the leader board.
snippet: Steve Flesch was one of the few players who had no issues with the bunkers at the Memorial, and for good reason. He was not in any of them Thursday, which might explain why he was atop the leader board.
